name: IslandLocked
title: Island Locked
author: Vadatajs
description: Improve upon kapaer's 'Islands World' mod.  Removes landfill (to force island-hopping) and adds Dark Matter Replicators enabled to ore tier to smooth out the lack of resources (the challenge should be a lack of land anyhow).  Goal on initial island is to get to trains to make more land available.
